definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The dials can be painted only in the original exterior colors Bentley.
sentences.chinese: 刻度盤只能塗上賓利原來外部的顏色。

sentences.english: Improperly implemented, dials can be extremely difficult to manipulate .
sentences.chinese: 如果設計不當，刻度盤將會非常難於操作。

sentences.english: Can you read the number on the dial?
sentences.chinese: 你能讀出刻度盤上的讀數嗎？

sentences.english: The thumbwheel is a variant of the dial, but one that is much easier to use.
sentences.chinese: 是一種刻度盤的變體，但其比刻度盤更容易使用。

sentences.english: The thumbwheel is a variant of the dial, but one that is much easier to use.
sentences.chinese: 是一種刻度盤的變體，但其比刻度盤更容易使用。

sentences.english: He keeps fiddling with the dials on the radio, he is sure to put it out of order.
sentences.chinese: 他老是玩弄收音機上的刻度盤，一定會把它弄壞的。
